Bailey B(arton) Burritt
(c. 1878 - 18 Jun 1954)

American social worker.

comment.author: 22848403@N02
comment._content:
This is the reason a background story needed for each photo picture and this social worker must has done something uniquely, otherwise, he wouldn't be taken this photo and printed on news paper.  A brief introductory of this person will bring this image to live.......knowing this photo's background story will make viewers walking into time tunnel back to America's 1900 or the world in 1900.

The time tunnel walking is the major attraction to these valuable historical photos.

comment.author: 19237938@N00
comment._content: @Nancyliu : i totally agree about the need for a background story!

comment._content: this is an absolutely stunning portrait.

comment.author: 61849735@N00
comment._content: If you follow the link matt house found you will find that he worked for the State of NY and he planned a residential project for alcoholics.  Or as he called them inebriates.  I find the interesting thing about these pictures is reading what others find out about the person  or event or finding sources of information for myself.  Really isn't hard.
